definition[0]: to cut off hair very close to the skin, especially from the face, using a razor
example[2]: She shaved her legs and underarms.
definition[1]: to remove very thin pieces from the surface of something
example[3]: Shave thin strips of cheese over the pasta.
definition[2]: if a man has a shave, he cuts off the hair on his face close to his skin using a razor
example[4]: He looked as if he needed a shave.
example[5]: I’ll just have a shave before we go.
